lines.text:
[comes in looking for Li Feng]
Is Li here?

[narrows his eyes at him]
Huh, you're not afraid I'll chop ya' all up? What do you want?

[chuckles confidently]
Save your breath, ya midget, I came prepared today. See?
[shows Quy a small butterfly blade and begins flipping it back and forth]
You call that a knife?
[shows off a bigger butterfly blade]
And what do ya' call this?

[tries to break it up]
Hey calm down, Quy. You really wanna kill him?

[sarcastically]
Why, are you related?

[rolls his eyes]
I guess you're right.

[after he shows up with two women at Wang's birthday party and gives him a gift]
Sorry I'm late guys. Wang, happy birthday.

[watches as his wife takes the package]
Billy, if you didn't screw around, you'd die.
Hey Wang, relax.
[gestures to the women]
They're just regular friends. Besides, I brought them along to help celebrate.
Hmm, you're not worried about your cousin.

[smiles]
Today's your birthday, there's no need to get mad.
[to Billy]
You're too much. You know I don't like your playboy ways, yet you flout girls in front of me. He'll send you to Thailand for training. If you screw around, you'll have no strength left.

[confidently]
Hey, that's no problem! I can go to Thailand right now.

[skeptically]
Right. Go screw around.
